thread.title: Ruined shop still smoking after blast kills four in UK's Leicester

title: Ruined shop still smoking after blast kills four in UK's Leicester
text:
Ruined shop still smoking after blast kills four in UK's Leicester 8:39am EST - 00:45 
Aerial footage from the scene of a deadly blast at a convenience store shows smoke still rising from the building in the British city of Leicester. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Aerial footage from the scene of a deadly blast at a convenience store shows smoke still rising from the building in the British city of Leicester. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
